sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Will arrives at his apartment, he takes a good look into his apartment without a clouded thought and realizes that it is a freaking mess.

sentences.name: Will
sentences.sentence: Maybe i should clean for a bit.

sentences.name: Narator-Participant
sentences.sentence: He then cleans the apartment and after a while he sees Anna stuff that he brought back from the hospital.

sentences.name: Narator-Participant
sentences.sentence: On the top was the last book that she ever read. Will sees it up and remembers a fond memory that he has.
